title: SOLD: T227 Marquard, P2 Jennings, and P2 Bender

posts.post_title: SOLD: T227 Marquard, P2 Jennings, and P2 Bender
posts.post_content:
I have the following for sale: 

T227 Rube Marquard SGC 20 - sold
P2 Chief Bender PSA 6 - pending
P2 Hugh Jennings PSA 5 - pending

Offers are welcome. Prices include shipping. Prefer paypal as gift or money order.

Scans can be found at the link below.

[url]http://imageevent.com/smithvintagecards/cardsforsale[/url]

Please email me at [url]smithvintagecards@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

Danny
Email sent regarding T227 Marquard.  Thanks

Pm sent on jennings, thanks
Dan
